Key Match Events: Bench clearing incident after Anthony Volpe's hard tag on Maikel Garcia
Royals responded with a run after the incident
Miscellaneous Highlights: The crowd came to life after the benches cleared
A 'Yankees suck' chant broke out in the ballpark
Others: Jazz Chisholm Jr. has been at the center of controversy for the last two games
Royals pitcher Angel Zerpa stared down Gleyber Torres and the Yankees' bench after striking him out
